law.catch_line: Fiscal court's determination on proposed tax rate levy by certain districts created with zero cents as initial tax rate levy -- Applicability of KRS 132.023 to tax rate changes.
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of KRS 216.310 to 216.360 to the contrary, the board of a hospital district created after January 1, 1994, proposing to levy a tax rate, in which the initial tax rate levy was zero cents ($0.00), shall submit the proposed tax rate levy to the fiscal court in the district for that county's fiscal court consideration. The fiscal court may either approve or deny the proposed tax rate levy. Any tax rate change approved by the board or by the county fiscal court shall be subject to the provisions of KRS 132.023.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
